item.title: 观点：Unhedged 的罗伯特-阿姆斯特朗（Robert Armstrong）写道："虽然优秀的管理可以让公司变得更好，但始终占据主导地位的大公司几乎总是具有结构性优势。
item.description:
Opinion: While great management can make companies much better, large companies that consistently dominate almost always have structural advantages, writes Unhedged’s Robert Armstrong https://t.co/sLVne62vXU pic.twitter.com/T8bPaKNxbl

— Financial Times (@FT) March 13, 2024

item.title: 中国是占主导地位的太阳能设备供应商，去年其生产能力翻了一番，使美国的太阳能设备价格创下新低。这对希望与之竞争的美国开发商构成了威胁
item.description:
China is the dominant solar equipment supplier and it doubled its production capacity last year, driving prices to record lows in the US. This is a threat to American developers who want to compete with it https://t.co/JB0T1bg2CS pic.twitter.com/3JmZvzFkyS

— Financial Times (@FT) March 13, 2024
